name: Rock, Paper, MONSTERS!
blurb: What happens when you combine the classic Rock Paper Scissors game with Monsters? An epic new mobile game!

rewards.reward: STICKY NOTE CHALLENGE - Every dollar counts! For every backer, I'll write your name on a sticky note and add it to my WALL OF FANG. At the end of the campaign I'll take a picture of the wall and share it with the world
ROCK - Copy of "Rock Paper MONSTERS!" on your iPhone or Android device + your name displayed in the credits as a "Rock Level" backer! ++ PLUS ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS ++

PAPER - A special "I <3 Indie Games" sticker to show your support for indie game developers everywhere + Personal "Thank You" email  + your name displayed in the credits as a "Paper Level" backer! ++ PLUS ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS ++

MONSTERS! - A unique Monster called "Kicksta" which will give you a kickstart to dominating your friends + A digital copy of the soundtrack + a PDF of concept art + have your name displayed in the credits as a "MONSTER Level" backer! ++ PLUS ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS ++

LIMITED TIME OFFER - Bring your imagination to life as I work with you to design every detail of your very own Monster and have it playable in-game. You'll help me design everything from it's name, apperance, and stats. You'll also receive this Monster in-game when it launches. How sweet is that? (If you want to receive the rewards from higher tiers, select this reward and update the pledge amount to reflect the tier you want) ++ PLUS ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS ++
BRONZE - A unique "Rock Paper MONSTERS!" T-Shirt + have your name displayed in the credits as a "Bronze Level" backer! ++ PLUS ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS ++

SILVER - A unique "Rock Paper MONSTERS!" Hoodie + certificate of Awesomeness + signed art + personal thank you letter + have your name displayed in the credits as a "SILVER Level" backer! ++ PLUS ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS ++
GOLD -  An epic FATHEAD wall peel of a Monster of your choice + have your name displayed in the credits as a "GOLD Level" backer! ++ PLUS ALL PREVIOUS REWARDS ++

BUSINESS LEVEL 1 - INDIE ROCK - Are you an Indie startup business or entrepreneur? Want to share your message and drive more traffic to your site? At this level, I will advertise your startup with a direct link to your site in-game. Every startup could use more visibility, and having permanent visibility in a mobile app can be a good way to drive traffic.

BUSINESS LEVEL 2 - This is an amazing opportunity for you to advertise your business to potentially millions of people by advertising your brand, product, or service as an in-game ITEM. This is a permanent advertisement and will persist through the lifetime of the game. Take advantage of this opportunity today!\r\n\r\n(example: A beverage company could have their beverage showcased in the game for users to use on their Monsters and also learn about their products)

BUSINESS LEVEL 3 - Want even more visibility? Get your brand, product, or service as an in-game MONSTER. I'll work with you to represent your business in the form of an in-game Monster. Own a cupcake business? We'll make a Cupcake monster! Own pooper scooper business? Well we'll figure something out... This is a permanent advertisement and will persist through the lifetime of the game. Take advantage of this opportunity today!

BUSINESS LEVEL 4 - SPONSOR - ONLY 1 AVAILABLE - At this level, your business will be listed as a sponsor who helped make Rock Paper MONSTERS! a reality. Everytime the game is opened, your corporate logo and website will be displayed on a splash screen for every user to see, plus much, much more. This is the highest level of visibility and will be a great advertising tool for you at a low cost compared to other options.
